solution_line_template: Matthew scored {matthew_score} points and there are {points_per_basket} points per basket, so he made {matthew_score} / {points_per_basket} = <<{matthew_score}/{points_per_basket}={matthew_baskets}>>{matthew_baskets} baskets.
Shawn scored {shawn_score} points, so he made {shawn_score} / {points_per_basket} = <<{shawn_score}/{points_per_basket}={shawn_baskets}>>{shawn_baskets} baskets.
The total number of baskets made is {matthew_baskets} + {shawn_baskets} = <<{matthew_baskets}+{shawn_baskets}={total_baskets}>>{total_baskets} baskets made.
